TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit EncoderParameter extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class EncoderParameter Implements IDisposable
public ref class EncoderParameter sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 用於將值或值的陣列傳遞至影像編碼器。

span.span: Used to pass a value, or an array of values, to an image encoder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以使用物件，以接收特定參數的特定的影像編碼器所支援的可能值清單。You can also use an object to receive a list of possible values supported by a particular parameter of a particular image encoder. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to create a using the constructor. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`VaryQualityLevel`從表單的建構函式的方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `VaryQualityLevel` method from the form's constructor. 這個範例需要名為影像檔`TestPhoto.jpg`位於**c:\\**。This example requires an image file named `TestPhoto.jpg` located at **c:\\**. [!code-csharp[UsingImageEncodersDecoders#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/UsingImageEncodersDecoders/CS/Form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[UsingImageEncodersDecoders#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/UsingImageEncodersDecoders/VB/Form1.vb#8)] [!code-csharp[UsingImageEncodersDecoders#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/UsingImageEncodersDecoders/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[UsingImageEncodersDecoders#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/UsingImageEncodersDecoders/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

related.span: 使用 Managed GDI+ 中的影像編碼器和解碼器

span.span: Using Image Encoders and Decoders in Managed GDI+

param.name: denominator

span.span: An array of 32-bit integers that specifies the denominators of the fractions.

param.span: 陣列中的整數不可為負值。

span.span: The integers in the array must be nonnegative.

param.span: 指定索引的分母和相同索引的分子相配對。

span.span: A denominator of a given index is paired with the numerator of the same index.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified object and two arrays of 32-bit integers.

summary.span: 這兩個陣列表示分數的陣列。

span.span: The two arrays represent an array of fractions.

summary.span: 設定 屬性為 ，並設定 屬性為 陣列中的元素數目，這個數目必須和 陣列中的元素數目相同。

span.span: Sets the property to , and sets the property to the number of elements in the array, which must be the same as the number of elements in the array.

summary.span: 有理數範圍是從最小分數值到最大分數值的所有分數集合。

span.span: A rational range is the set of all fractions from a minimum fractional value through a maximum fractional value.
